2.「では <%sL_ITEM>を 頼むとしよう。| どれを渡すか 決めてくれ。|<: So, you'll give me the <%sL_ITEM>.|Please choose which one.|<break>

3.「<%sL_ITEM>を 頼みたいが……| 今は 持ってないようだな。| 他に: I'd like a <%sL_ITEM>, but it|seems you don't have one. Is there anything|else you can deliver to me?|<break>

4.「今日は 何の用だ？|<break>: What can I do for you today?<break>

5.「今日の依頼は 翌朝には すべて別の依頼に| 入れ替えておこう。| 明日も また: All of today's requests will be replaced by|another one the next morning. I'll be back|tomorrow...<end>

9.「仕事がほしければ 私のところへ来い。| お前に ちょうどいい依頼を 紹介してや:
You want a job, you come to me. I've got just|the job for you. You go to "View Requests"|and you see... If you deliver what I ask for,|
|you get paid on the spot, and the job is|yours. I've yellowed the most lucrative|requests. And if your fishing level is 16 or|
|above, sometimes I'll let you do special|requests... Orange... Expect to be paid...|I'll replace the request with a new one the|
|next morning, but for now, I'll take three|requests a day. You won't get three jobs the|first time, but as your fishing skills|
|improve, you'll be asked to do more. And if|you come in the next morning with more than|three jobs left to do, we'll increase the|
|number of requests by one per day...

10.「今 頼める依頼は こんなところだ。| この中に すぐに納品できそうなものは|: Here's what I need right now. Is there|anything on this list that you can deliver|to me?|<break>

11.「他に すぐ納品できそうな依頼は あるか？|<break>: Are there any other requests that you can|fulfill?|<break>

12.「釣りの依頼だが| すまない。今日はもう 間に合っている。| また 明日になった: I've got a fishing request, but... I can't|make it today. I'll come back tomorrow...<bw_break>

13.「今日の依頼は 全て済んだようだな。| 今 お前に頼める仕事は 無さそうだ。|<: I've done everything you asked me to do|today. There's nothing you can do for me now.<bw_break>

14.<%sL_ITEM>を 納品しますか？|釣り経験値：<%dL_EXP>P|おさか: Deliver the <%sL_ITEM>?|You'll receive <%dL_EXP> Fishing EXP and|<%dL_COIN> Fish Coins.|<yesno><close>

15.「どうやら 報酬を受け取れないようだな。| おさかなコインを減らしてから また来: I can't give you your reward until you spend|some of your Fish Coins first.|<bw_break>

19.「……うむ 良い魚だ。| 依頼の品 確かに受けとった。| 報酬を くれてやろう。: Mhm, a great fish. It's exactly what I asked|for. Please take this reward.<end>

20.「ちゃんと仕事用に釣って| 持ってくるのだぞ。| 他に 納品できそうな依頼は あ: I'll be sure to bring you some fish for work.|Is there anything else you think you can|deliver?<break>

21.「むっ 確かに依頼の品だが……| そのデキでは 受け取れないな。|<bw_bre: Yes, it's a request, but... But I can't|accept it in that condition.<bw_break>

22.「ちょうど <%sL_ITEM>が| 不足していてな。今 持ってきてくれれば|: We just ran out of <%sL_ITEM>. If you bring|it to me now, I'll give you an extra...<break>

23.「めずらしく <%sL_ITEM>の| 注文が来ている。とても 難しい依頼だ。|: I have a rare request for one|<%sL_ITEM>. It's quite difficult. If you|can catch one, you'll be handsomely rewarded.|<break>

25.「おお これは驚いた！| こんなに大きな <%sL_ITEM>は| なかなか 釣:
Wow, amazing! It's not every day that you|catch a <%sL_ITEM> this big!|
|I'll mark your rewards down. Keep up the|great work.|

26.「……うむ 良い魚だ。| しかも かなりの大物と見える。| 少し多めに 報酬をや: ... Mm, good. And it's a pretty big one. I'll|give you a little extra.<end>

27.「その魚は 自分で釣った物では ないだろう。| 私を失望させないでくれ。|<bw: You didn't catch that fish yourself.|Please don't disappoint me.<bw_break>

28.「ごきげんよう 若者よ| 釣りがしたければ そこの道具屋で| 釣りざおとルアーを:
Good day, young man, if you want to fish, go|to your local tackle shop and buy a fishing|rod and lure. You'll need both a fishing rod|
|and a lure, and you'll need to be near the|water.If you press the "+" button, you can start|fishing... Just drop your line and wait...|And when you see the fish...You have to push! Even if you don't press it|right away, the fish won't run away, but|there's nothing to be gained by waiting|
|idly... Each fishing lure can be used a|certain number of times... If it's broken,|you can buy another one at the tool store...|
|Good, huh?

29.「おお <%sL_FISH_RANK>サイズの魚を <%nL_FISH_NUM>:
Oh, you've caught <%dL_FISH_NUM> <%sL_FISH_RANK> size fish.|
|You've done well. I will give you a bigger|bag to hold your fish in.|

30.<speed=0><pipipi_off>|さかなぶくろが 大きくなった！|<s: <speed=0><pipipi_off>You now have a bigger fish bag!|<se_nots System 7><pipipi_on><end>

31.「おお！ キングサイズの魚を 釣り上げたのか！| これは 褒美をやらんわけには: Oh! You've caught a King Size fish!|I'll have to reward you.<end>

33.<pipipi_on>|「新しく <%nL_MEDAL_NUM>種類 釣ったんだ: <pipipi_on>You've caught <%dL_MEDAL_NUM> unique types of fish.|Here, take these <%dL_MEDAL_NUM> Mini Medals.|<end>

34.さかなを <%dL_BAG_SIZE>匹まで 持てるようになった！: Your fish bag can now carry up to <%dL_BAG_SIZE> fish!

36.「おお 釣り上げた <%sL_FISH_RANK>サイズの 魚の数が| <%nL: Oh! I see that you've caught <%dL_KEIHIN_NUM> unique types|of <%sL_FISH_RANK> Size fish. Please take|these <%dL_KEIHIN_NUM2> <%sL_KEIHIN_ITEM>.

38.「どの説明を 聞きたいんだ。|<select_se_off>|依頼をみる|褒美を: What do you want to know?|<select_se_off>|View Requests|lView Rewards|About the Fish Bag|<select_end>|<break>

39.「釣った 魚の種類数に応じて| 私から新たに 褒美を渡すことにした。| 釣り道を:
Depending on the number of unique types of|fish you catch, I will reward you.|
|I'll give you different rewards based on the|different fish sizes: "Normal", "Big", and|"King".|
|However to receive the Big Size rewards, you|will need to be Fishing Level 19, and for|King Size you will need Fishing Level 24.|
|If you are interested in seeing the rewards,|please choose "Rewards".|

40.「お前に 新しく伝えておくことがある。|<br>|「釣り上げた キングサイズの種:
I have some news for you. For each King Size|fish you catch, I will reward you. I hope|you'll continue to hone your skills.|
|However, you will not be able to receive these|rewards until you complete my trial after|reaching Fishing Level 24.|
|You can view these rewards by choosing|"Rewards".|

41.「むむっ <%sL_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいのようだな。| 空きがないと: Hmm.. your <%sL_BAG_TYPE> is full.|You'll need to free up at least one empty|slot if you want your reward.|<end>

44.「褒美の一覧だ。『ビッグ』は 釣りレベル１９| 『キング』は 釣りレベル２４で: Here's the list of rewards. You'll need|Fishing Level 19 for "Big" rewards and Fishing|Level 24 for "King" rewards.|<break>

45.「ノーマルサイズと ビッグサイズの| 釣った魚の種類に応じて| さかなぶくろを:
Depending on the type of fish I caught,|normal size or big size, I'd switch out the|fish bag for a bigger one... We've reached 30|
|species and 50 varieties for the normal size,|and 10 species and 30 varieties for the big|size. ... But for the big ones, I had to|
|catch 50 normal-sized ones first... There's a|certain order to things...

46.「これが 褒美の一覧だ。| 『キングサイズの褒美』は 釣りレベル２４で| 与える: This is the list of rewards. The King Size|rewards can be earned once your Fishing Level|reaches 24 and you complete my trial.|<break>
